title: Landscape with Figures Fishing
marks:
Inscription

at R edge of mount, in pencil: ille
description: landscape in brown ink with water in foreground; figure in a small boat, LRC; another figure in LLQ sitting on a dock, fishing; building at ULC; cross next to trees at center; 2 figures on shore under tree R of center; another small boat with figure below 2 figures on shore; attached to blue mount
creditline: Gift of the Joseph F. McCrindle Collection
